memberdef.argsstring: (float32_t *pSrc, uint16_t fftSize, uint16_t bitRevFactor, const uint16_t *pBitRevTab)
memberdef.name: riscv_bitreversal_f32

parameterdescription.para: points to in-place floating-point data buffer
bit reversal modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same bit reversal table

memberdef.argsstring: (float32_t *pSrc, uint16_t fftLen, const float32_t *pCoef, uint16_t twidCoefModifier)
memberdef.name: riscv_radix4_butterfly_f32

detaileddescription.para: end of ComplexFFT group brief Core function for the floating-point CFFT butterfly process. param[in,out] pSrc points to the in-place buffer of floating-point data type param[in] fftLen length of the FFT param[in] pCoef points to the twiddle coefficient buffer param[in] twidCoefModifier twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table return none

memberdef.argsstring: (float32_t *pSrc, uint16_t fftLen, const float32_t *pCoef, uint16_t twidCoefModifier, float32_t onebyfftLen)
memberdef.name: riscv_radix4_butterfly_inverse_f32

detaileddescription.para: brief Core function for the floating-point CIFFT butterfly process. param[in,out] pSrc points to the in-place buffer of floating-point data type param[in] fftLen length of the FFT param[in] pCoef points to twiddle coefficient buffer param[in] twidCoefModifier twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table. param[in] onebyfftLen value of 1/fftLen return none

briefdescription.para: Processing function for the floating-point Radix-4 CFFT/CIFFT.

xrefdescription.para: Do not use this function. It has been superseded by riscv_cfft_f32 and will be removed in the future.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point Radix-4 CFFT/CIFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place
